snippet: The actor Travis Fine opted for a career change as an airline pilot after Sept. 11, but he’s come back to filmmaking, as a director. His “Any Day Now” opens this month.
abstract: James Fine, who traded career in acting for one as commercial airline pilot after September 11, has returned to filmmaking as director of movie Any Day Now; he discusses appeal of film's script, his role in bringing it to screen and his life as a pilot.
lead_paragraph: The actor Travis Fine opted for a career change as an airline pilot after Sept. 11, but he’s come back to filmmaking, as a director. His “Any Day Now” opens this month.

headline.seo: Travis Fine Directs the Film ‘Any Day Now’
headline.main: A Pilot's Round Trip Back to Movies
headline.print_headline: A Pilot's Round Trip Back to Movies
